PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_BuiltSystemRailwayLine
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties common to the definition of a railway line system, which is a set of functional tracks with explicit terminals. It is usually composed of a set of tracks with continuous track parts and alignments. > NOTE `IfcBuiltSystem.ObjectType` should be set to `RAILWAYLINE`

PropertyDef.Name: LineID
PropertyDef.Definition: The unique identifier of the line.

PropertyDef.Name: IsElectrified
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the track system is electrified or not.

PropertyDef.Name: LineCharacteristic
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the characteristic of the line.
